adverbs.description: virally (comparative more virally, superlative most virally)

entries.meaning: (medicine) Due to, or by means of, a virus or viruses.
examples: The cells have been virally infected.

entries.meaning: In a viral fashion; often specifically in the context of viral marketing.
examples: The widespread use of mobile phones which support free Bluetoothing has enabled promotional videos to be distributed virally between handsets.
